Content: The third term of 2019 of the Sinhala and Tamil medium schools commences today. However, the Ministry of Education announced that 12 schools which will be used to mark the answer scripts of Advanced Level and Grade 5 scholarship examinations will be closed until the 16th of this month. Therefore, Royal College Colombo, Nalanda College Colombo, Bambalapitiya Hindu College, Kalutara Gnanodaya, Ratnapura Mihindu Vidyala, St. Annes Kurunegala, Kingswood Kandy, Viharamahadevi Balika Vidyalaya Kandy, Seethadevi Balika Vidyalaya Kandy, Vidyaloka Galle, Viharamahadevi Balika Vidyalaya Badulla and Uva Maha Vidyalaya, Badulla will be closed until the 16th of this month.
